statements: DELETE FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1001 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM Users WHERE user_id = 100 AND first_name = 'John';
DELETE FROM Transactions WHERE seller_id = 200 OR transaction_type = 'refund';
DELETE FROM Transactions WHERE user_id = 500 AND transaction_type = 'purchase';
DELETE FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_id = 100 AND user_id = 50;
DELETE FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'refund' AND transaction_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
